OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY ASSOCIATION (SOHSA)

Desc.entry: Established in 1922, the Sheffield Occupational Health and Safety Association's mission is to protect peoples health and safety by ensuring risks in the changing workplace are properly controlled. Aims to support local companies and individuals in their quest for improved health and safety performance and thirst for relevant knowledge. SOHSA is a not-for-profit organisation.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Tues in alternate months at 2pm (meeting) - tea/coffee available from 1.30pm
